biotools.summary: BLVector is a fast BLAST-Like Aagorithm for multicore CPU with vectorization.  BLVector produces a list in a similar way than BLAST. BLVector provides a score based on the result of a Smith-Waterman algorithm with affine gaps which is the result of applying a score matrix like BLOSUM62 or PAM30.

bioschemas.name: BLVector
